Enable or Disable Caching

Source: R/cache.R
use_cache.Rd

Sets the caching behavior for retrosheetshow downloads.

Usage

use_cache(enabled = TRUE)

Arguments

enabled

Logical. TRUE to enable caching, FALSE to disable.

Value

The previous caching setting (invisibly)

Details

When caching is disabled, files are always downloaded fresh and not stored in the cache directory. This can be useful for testing or when you need the absolute latest data.

The setting is stored as an environment variable RETROSHEETSHOW_CACHE for the current R session only.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Disable caching for this session
use_cache(FALSE)

# Re-enable caching
use_cache(TRUE)
} # }
